tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE patient_feedback (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    survey_date DATE,
    satisfaction_score INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE PatientFeedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    satisfaction_rating INT,
    feedback_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE SurveyResults (
    survey_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    survey_date DATE,
    question1 TEXT,
    question2 TEXT,
    question3 TEXT,
    overall_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient_Satisfaction_Surveys (
    survey_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT NOT NULL,
    survey_rating INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    survey_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Feedback_History (
    feedback_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    survey_id INT NOT NULL,
    feedback_text TEXT,
    feedback_date DATE,
    feedback_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  age INTEGER,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  diagnosis VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE surveys (
  survey_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER,
  satisfaction_rating INTEGER,
  feedback TEXT,
  survey_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE oncologists (
  oncologist_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(50),
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  years_of_experience INTEGER
)

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INTEGER,
  oncologist_id INTEGER,
  appointment_date DATE,
  notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE patient_info (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    date_of_birth DATE,
    contact_number VARCHAR(15),
    email_address VARCHAR(50),
);

CREATE TABLE survey_responses (
    response_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT, 
    survey_date DATE, 
    satisfaction_rating INT, 
    feedback TEXT, 
);

CREATE TABLE appointment_history (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT, 
    appointment_date DATE, 
    doctor_name VARCHAR(50), 
    department VARCHAR(50), 
);

CREATE TABLE patient_diagnosis (
    diagnosis_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    patient_id INT, 
    diagnosis_date DATE, 
    diagnosis_description TEXT, 
    treating_physician VARCHAR(50), 
);

CREATE TABLE service_feedback (
    feedback_id INT PRIMARY KEY, 
    service_date DATE, 
    service_rating INT, 
    feedback_text TEXT, 
    staff_name VARCHAR(50), 
);
